== Who I am ==

My name is Roger Knecht, and I have been a member of the Ubuntu Kernel Team since January 2024. 

== My Ubuntu story ==

My Linux journey started in 2007 by whipping my computer's operating system with Debian Etch. The successful installation was my very beginning in Open Source and brought me a few moments of joy before realizing that my wifi isn't working due to some missing proprietary firmware :-/

Since then I was stuck with Linux. My curiosity in how things work internally led me to Gentoo and when my patience for compiling packages was finally exhausted I settled for Ubuntu.

=== My involvement ===

I have been involved in the SRU (Stable Release Updates) process of releasing various Ubuntu kernel packages.
